quote_last: Mark had awoken, but he wasn’t awake. His head was swimming with incoherent thoughts. The first vision to flash across his mind was Elizabeth; he smiled.
title: Shall We Tell the President?
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first:
He had been parked there for seven minutes already; he could only afford a few more before someone might become suspicious.
“C’mon. . . c’mon,” he was muttering. “Let’s get this over with.”
He checked his watch:
title: The Ambition
author: Lee Strobel

quote_last: Rush hour traffic crept forward in the pale morning light. Casey twisted her rearview mirror, and leaned over to check her makeup.
title: Airframe
author: Michael Crichton

quote_first: The familiar radium numerals on my left wrist confirmed the clock tower. It was
quote_last: . I seemed to be filling a set of loud maroon pajamas which were certainly not mine. My vis-a-vis was wearing a little number in yellow.
title: Too Like the Lightning
author: Dana Chambers
